reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032: BORROWING BY-LAWS, DEBENTURES AND LOANS

content.content: 1. (1) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 1 (1). (2) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 1 (1).

(2) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. The borrowing by-law, for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality, shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The borrowing by-law, for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality, shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 3 (1). (2) The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality, shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within district or regional municipalities, shall be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 3 (1).

(2) The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by district or regional municipalities on behalf of an area municipality, shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. The affidavit of the clerk of the municipality referred to in subsection 2 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The affidavit of the clerk of the municipality referred to in subsection 2 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 4.

content.content: 5. The application for a loan referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The application for a loan referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 5.

content.content: 6. The inspection and completion certificate referred to in section 4 of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. The inspection and completion certificate referred to in section 4 of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 6.

content.content: 7. (1) The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act, for use by a municipality, shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 7 (1). (2) The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act, for use by a district or regional municipality, shall be in Form 10. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 7 (2).
content.raw_html:
7. (1) The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act, for use by a municipality, shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 7 (1).

(2) The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act, for use by a district or regional municipality, shall be in Form 10. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1032, s. 7 (2).

content.content:
